NAME: Resources
DESCRIPTION: How much money your character has access to

NAME: Fame
DESCRIPTION: How well known your character is and what his fame lets him

NAME: Contacts
DESCRIPTION: How many major contacts your character has

NAME: Clan Prestige
DESCRIPTION: Your esteem with member of a certain clan
BACKGROUND_QUESTION: Describe how you gained your prestige in the clan. (Note that the clan name should be entered as if it was a speciality)

NAME: Mentor
DESCRIPTION: Some important kindred which mentors you

NAME: Influence
DESCRIPTION: Your control over a mortal sphere

NAME: Allies
DESCRIPTION: Important mortal working with you on some issues

NAME: Communal Haven
DESCRIPTION: A secure location controlled by a coterie

NAME: Blasphemous Shrine
BACKGROUND_QUESTION: Describe the shrine and the connection the desecrated corpse has to Set
